title: ISic003454. I.Sicily inscription 003454
body:
Facsimile Images

((cross_latin)) Ένθάδε
κὲτε Ἰωά-
[νν]ης μον-
[αχὸ]ς ὁ Με-
5[νου]θ

Apparatus criticus

Text of Rizzone 2009 5: μαν Rizzone 2009 suggests as alternative

Italian translation

Qui giace Iohannes monaco, Menouth (o Mamanth).

English translation

Here lies Iohannes Menouth (or Mamanth), the monk.

commentary

The text of Cordano 2005 / 2014 is misleading (and the suggestion that the text is in a mixture of Greek and Latin is clearly incorrect), and the edition of Rizzone is to be preferred.

bibliography

    2009.0439 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283 59.1110 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 Rizzone 2009 431-434 no.2 fig.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001634 Cordano 2014 109 no.11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001366 Cordano 2005 125 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002668
